info.document:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox+ SubscribeThank you for subscribing!Could not subscribe, try again laterInvalid Email

Freshers' Week is very close to kicking off in Coventry, with students coming from all over the UK - and, indeed, the world - to study for three or more years at Coventry University and the University of Warwick .

The Freshers' Fair is something which attracts students every year due to the promise of freebies and goody bags, but this year Coventry University is offering an array of other events for you to attend.

You might be a little apprehensive about embarking on a brand new challenge. Don't worry, it's only natural.

We all get filled with trepidation at times.

University can be a daunting prospect for anybody, but everyone who goes there manages to survive and have the best years of their life.

So, with that in mind, why not attend one of these and break the ice with your flatmates?

Sat 23 September

Official Opening Party

9pm - 3am

Square One, Coventry University, Priory St, Coventry, CV1 5QP

The official opening event for Freshers 2017.

Sun 24 September

Picture Postcard

3pm - 5pm

University Square

Open to all new students! Gather together in the University Square for a photograph that will be printed onto a postcard!

Eat & Greet

5pm - 7pm

The Hub Rooftop Garden

Come along and meet the CUSU Sabb team and fellow freshers!

The BIG Bar Tour

7pm - 3am

Multiple, across Coventry City Centre

A HUGE tour of the bars in Coventry, finishing with a huge after party!

Mon 25 September

Freshers Fair

11am - 4pm

The Cathedral Ruins

Grab yourself some freebies, with the biggest Freshers Fair of the year!

Ice Skating

1pm - 4pm

Planet Ice, Croft Road, Coventry, CV1 3AZ

Whether you've never ice skated before, or do it professionally, it's time for you to get your ice time in!

Laser Quest

7pm - 9pm

Coventry Laser Quest, Watch Close, Coventry, CV1 3LN

Enter the futuristic world of Laser Quest at Coventry's award-winning site! Battle as a team to accomplish your mission and become the victors.

The BIG Freshers Quiz

7:30pm - 11pm

Square One, Coventry University, Priory St, Coventry, CV1 5QP

New to 2017, we host a BIG Quiz, with even BIGGER prizes!

Back to School Disco - Bubble Luv

9pm - 3am

Kasbah, Primrose Hill St, Coventry, CV1 5LY

Exclusive ALL-IN Pass event

Pool Party, Under the Moon

9:30pm - 11pm

Swimming Baths, Coventry Sports & Leisure Centre, Coventry, CV1 5RY

Very Exclusive, never before seen, the MOON is brought indoors for the ultimate Freshers Pool Party!

Tue 26 September

Societies Fair

11am - 4pm

The Cathedral Ruins

Whether you're interested in Chess, watching movies, or singing - we have a society for you!

Ice Skating

1pm - 3pm

Planet Ice, Croft Road, Coventry, CV1 3AZ

Whether you've never ice skated before, or do it professionally, it's time for you to get your ice time in!

Freshers Ball

7pm - midnight

Coventry Cathedral Ruins

Brand New for 2017, the Coventry Uni Freshers Ball is here! Dress to impress as we take the party into the Cathedral Ruins.

Laser Quest

7pm - 9pm

Coventry Laser Quest, Watch Close, Coventry, CV1 3LN

Enter the futuristic world of Laser Quest at Coventry's award-winning site! Battle as a team to accomplish your mission and become the victors.

Wed 27 September

Sports & Wellbeing Fair

11am - 4pm

The Cathedral Ruins

Whether you're interested in American Football, Horseriding or Swimming - we have a sports club for you! Also featuring various of stalls all about your wellbeing, join us today to find out more!

Ice Skating

1pm - 4pm

Planet Ice, Croft Road, Coventry, CV1 3AZ

Whether you've never ice skated before, or do it professionally, it's time for you to get your ice time in!

Laser Quest

7pm - 9pm

Coventry Laser Quest, Watch Close, Coventry, CV1 3LN

Enter the futuristic world of Laser Quest at Coventry's award-winning site! Battle as a team to accomplish your mission and become the victors.

Hypnotist LIVE! - Robert Temple

7:30pm - 11pm

Square One, Coventry University, Priory St, Coventry, CV1 5QP

Come and watch as the Hypnotist picks volunteers to be the star of the show. Will you put yourself forward?

UV Full Moon Party

10pm - 3am

The Empire, 151 Far Gosford St, Coventry, CV1 5DU

We bring the spirit of Thailand to Coventry, for one night only!

Thu 28 September

Paintballing

noon - 6pm

Mobbs Wood Farm, Brinklow Rd, Coventry CV7 9JN

Experience the highest calibre paintballing day out on themed missions equipped with the latest kit.

Ice Skating

1pm - 4pm

Planet Ice, Croft Road, Coventry, CV1 3AZ

Whether you've never ice skated before, or do it professionally, it's time for you to get your ice time in!

Treasure Hunt

2pm - 6pm

Multiple, across Coventry City Centre

Get ready for CUSU's very own scavenger hunt with the chance to win!

Laser Quest

7pm - 9pm

Coventry Laser Quest, Watch Close, Coventry, CV1 3LN

Enter the futuristic world of Laser Quest at Coventry's award-winning site! Battle as a team to accomplish your mission and become the victors.

Zoo Party - featuring Charlie Sloth!

10pm - 3am

Kasbah, Primrose Hill St, Coventry, CV1 5LY

Let the animal out in you for the most elaborate party of the week!

Fri 29 September

Your Voice Day

10am - 4pm

TheHub, Coventry

Paintballing

noon - 6pm

Mobbs Wood Farm, Brinklow Rd, Coventry CV7 9JN

Experience the highest calibre paintballing day out on themed missions equipped with the latest kit.

Ice Skating

1pm - 4pm

Planet Ice, Croft Road, Coventry, CV1 3AZ

Whether you've never ice skated before, or do it professionally, it's time for you to get your ice time in!

Laser Quest

7pm - 9pm

Coventry Laser Quest, Watch Close, Coventry, CV1 3LN

Enter the futuristic world of Laser Quest at Coventry's award-winning site! Battle as a team to accomplish your mission and become the victors.

Fargo Student Lock In

7:30pm - 11pm

Fargo Village, Far Gosford St, Coventry CV1 5ED

One World Party

10pm - 3am

The Empire, 151 Far Gosford St, Coventry, CV1 5DU

The biggest international party of CUSU freshers..
